alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 9:51PM MDT until June 28 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL WELD AND NORTHWESTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 951 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jackson Reservoir, or 19 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Weld and northwestern Morgan Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
